snippet.title: The Lost Night | Super Cute Halloween JRPG meets Bullet Hell Shoot 'Em Up | PICO-8 Indie Spotlight
snippet.description:
The Lost Night
• https://afk-mario.itch.io/the-lost-night

The Lost Night is far and away one of the most ambitious PICO-8 titles that we've played!  While there are certainly more technical marvels, like POOM or picoCAD, but this game's scope is far beyond any other title on the fantasy console that we've yet to come across.  The writing is great, the gameplay is fun, and there are NO RANDOM BATTLES—and when you do have to battle, it plays like an arcade shoot 'em up!  Yeah, this game freaking rules!

Thanks for watching!  If you'd like to find us elsewhere on the internet, head on over to:

• https://linktr.ee/pursuingpixels
